products.name: Granular Activated Carbon Powder
products.description: Premium Coconut Shell Based Granular Activated Carbon for superior water & air purification with high adsorption capacity and long-lasting performance.
products.detailedDescription: Coconut Shell Based Granular Activated Carbon (GAC)Our Coconut Shell Based Granular Activated Carbon (GAC) is a premium-grade filtration media widely used in water treatment, air purification, food & beverage, and industrial applications. Manufactured from high-quality coconut shells, this activated carbon offers exceptional adsorption capacity, high surface area, and durability, making it the preferred choice for industries and households worldwide.Key Benefits of Coconut Shell Activated Carbon: 100% Natural & Sustainable – made from renewable coconut shells High Adsorption Capacity – effective removal of chlorine, VOCs, organic compounds, taste, odor, and color Superior Hardness & Low Dust – ensures long service life and better performance compared to coal or wood-based carbon Optimized Pore Structure – rich in micropores, ideal for removing small contaminants and improving water quality Versatile Applications – effective in both water and air purification    Why Choose Us as Your Activated Carbon Supplier?   We provide high-quality coconut shell activated carbon at competitive prices, ensuring consistent performance, bulk availability, and customized packaging options. Whether you need granular activated carbon (GAC), powdered activated carbon (PAC), or pelletized activated carbon, we deliver solutions tailored to your needs.

applications: Food & Beverage Processing (sugar, wine, soft drinks, edible oils)

products.name: Silica Sand
products.description: High-purity Silica Sand for water treatment, construction, glass manufacturing, and industrial applications – durable, reliable, and eco-friendly.
products.detailedDescription:
Silica Sand – Premium Quality for Industrial & Commercial Use

Our Silica Sand is a high-grade, naturally occurring mineral widely used in water treatment, glass manufacturing, construction, and industrial applications. With its high silica content, consistent grain size, and excellent chemical purity, it is one of the most reliable filtration and processing media available.

products.name: Pebbles
products.description: Natural Pebbles Media for water treatment, filtration plants, landscaping, and construction – durable, eco-friendly, and long-lasting performance.
products.detailedDescription:
Pebbles Media – Reliable Filtration & Multi-Purpose Use

Our Pebbles Media is a natural, hard, and durable material widely used in water treatment plants, sand filters, landscaping, and construction applications. Carefully graded and screened, these pebbles provide excellent support media for sand, anthracite, and other filter materials, ensuring maximum efficiency in filtration processes.

products.name: Gravels
products.description: High-quality Gravel Media for water filtration, wastewater treatment, and construction applications – durable, natural, and long-lasting support media.
products.detailedDescription:
Gravel Media – Strong & Reliable Filtration Support

Our Gravel Media is a naturally hard, durable, and chemically inert material used as a support media in water filtration systems and construction applications. With consistent grain size and high strength, gravel ensures efficient water flow, improved filtration, and long service life of treatment plants.

products.name: Core Sand
products.description: High-purity Silica Sand for water treatment, construction, glass manufacturing, and industrial applications – durable, reliable, and eco-friendly.
products.detailedDescription:
Core Sand – Premium Quality for Industrial & Commercial Use

Our Silica Sand is a high-grade, naturally occurring mineral widely used in water treatment, glass manufacturing, construction, and industrial applications. With its high silica content, consistent grain size, and excellent chemical purity, it is one of the most reliable filtration and processing media available.

products.name: Anthracite Media
products.description: High-grade Anthracite Filter Media for water treatment, wastewater purification, and industrial filtration – durable, efficient, and long-lasting.
products.detailedDescription:
Anthracite Filter Media – Premium Quality for Water Treatment

Our Anthracite Filter Media is a high-carbon, durable filtration material widely used in multimedia filters, drinking water plants, wastewater treatment, and industrial filtration systems. With its angular shape and high hardness, anthracite provides excellent turbidity removal, improved filtration rates, and longer filter runs compared to sand alone.

products.name: Powder Activated Carbon
products.description: High-quality Powder Activated Carbon (PAC) for water purification, wastewater treatment, air filtration, and industrial applications – fine, efficient, and fast-acting.
products.detailedDescription:
Powder Activated Carbon (PAC) – Fast-Acting & High Adsorption

Our Powder Activated Carbon (PAC) is a fine, high-purity adsorbent made from natural raw materials such as coconut shells and coal. Known for its large surface area, high adsorption capacity, and quick action, PAC is widely used in drinking water purification, wastewater treatment, food & beverage processing, and air purification.

products.name: MNo2
products.description: High-purity Manganese Dioxide (MnO₂) filter media for efficient removal of iron, manganese, and hydrogen sulfide from water – durable and long-lasting.
products.detailedDescription:
Manganese Dioxide (MnO₂) Filter Media – Effective Iron & Manganese Removal

Our Manganese Dioxide (MnO₂) filter media is a naturally occurring mineral specially processed for water treatment applications. Known for its strong oxidizing and catalytic properties, MnO₂ efficiently removes iron, manganese, and hydrogen sulfide (H₂S) from groundwater and industrial water supplies.

products.name: Water Softener Plant
products.description: ""High-performance Water Softener Plant designed to remove hardness from water, ensuring scale-free plumbing, efficient appliances, and pure water for industrial and domestic use.""
products.detailedDescription:
A Water Softener Plant is an advanced water treatment system designed to remove hardness-causing minerals like calcium (Ca²?) and magnesium (Mg²?) from water using ion exchange technology. Hard water creates scaling in pipelines, boilers, RO membranes, cooling towers, and household appliances, reducing efficiency and increasing maintenance costs. Our Water Softener Plant ensures:

100% soft water for domestic, commercial, and industrial applications

Protection against scaling, clogging, and corrosion

Longer life of pipelines, boilers, and appliances

Low maintenance & highly durable resin system

Available in manual, semi-automatic, and fully automatic models

By using premium-grade resins and a robust FRP/MS vessel design, our softeners deliver consistent performance with minimal salt and water usage during regeneration.

applications: Industrial Boilers & Cooling Towers – to prevent scale formation
Textile & Dyeing Units – for process water softening

soft water
?? Food & Beverage Industry – for improved product quality

products.name: DM Plant
products.description: ""High-efficiency Demineralization (DM) Plant designed to remove dissolved salts, minerals, and impurities, delivering 100% pure demineralized water for industrial and laboratory applications.""
products.detailedDescription:
A Demineralization (DM) Plant is a specialized water treatment system that removes dissolved salts, minerals, and impurities through cation and anion exchange resin technology. It produces high-purity demineralized water ideal for industrial, pharmaceutical, and laboratory use. Our DM Plant features:

Advanced ion-exchange resins for complete demineralization

Removes TDS, calcium, magnesium, sodium, chlorides, sulfates, nitrates etc.

Delivers water with conductivity as low as 0.1 µS/cm

Available in manual, semi-automatic & fully automatic models

Compact design, low maintenance, and durable performance

Can be supplied in FRP, MS, or SS vessels depending on application

With reliable operation and cost-effective regeneration, our DM Plant ensures consistent production of ultra-pure water.

applications: Food & Beverage Industry – safe and pure production water
RO/EDI Systems – as pre-treatment or polishing units

products.name: RO Planr
products.description: ""High-performance Reverse Osmosis (RO) Plant designed for pure, safe, and crystal-clear water by removing TDS, chemicals, salts, and impurities for industrial, commercial, and domestic use.""
products.detailedDescription:
A Reverse Osmosis (RO) Plant is an advanced water purification system that removes dissolved salts, heavy metals, bacteria, viruses, and chemical contaminants through a semi-permeable membrane. It ensures safe, healthy, and great-tasting water for industrial, commercial, and domestic applications. Our RO Plant features:

Advanced RO membrane technology with high salt rejection rate

Removes TDS, hardness, fluoride, arsenic, nitrates, chlorine, bacteria & viruses

Delivers water with low TDS and excellent taste

Available in domestic, commercial, and industrial models

Energy-efficient design with durable pumps and membranes

Options in FRP, SS, or skid-mounted systems for easy installation

Low maintenance, high recovery, and long service life

With a compact and robust design, our RO Plant ensures consistent supply of pure and safe water for multiple applications.

applications: Domestic Homes – safe & pure drinking water
Commercial Offices – cafeterias & staff drinking water
Colleges & Hospitals – safe water for large-scale use
Food & Beverage Industry – water for processing & production
Textile & Dyeing Industry – high-quality process water
Hotels & Restaurants – safe water for guests & kitchen use
